channel.title: crafting on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in crafting on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Guys! I made Shorts!
item.description: I’ve been sewing for about a year now, and I’ve made a handful of button down shirts, some gym shorts, baby clothes for my niece, and a peacoat for my guy.

item.title: Sewing up 2017
item.description: Before being felled by the flu shortly after Christmas, I had intended to write this at the end of December.
